Sentencas: The use of a perforated, ceramic layer, laminated on top of a porous electrode, as a support structure for solid oxide fuel cells is described.
Titulo: A support layer for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: The support layer can be used on either the anode or cathode side and allows for the fabrication of mechanically robust, impregnated electrodes.
Titulo: A support layer for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Using fuel cells based on yttria-stabilized zirconia (YSZ), we demonstrate that the support layer can be made from YSZ or from a composite of YSZ and La0.3Sr0.7TiO3 (LST).
Titulo: A support layer for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: It is shown that there is no solid-state reaction between LST and YSZ, even after calcination at 1550 degrees C.
Titulo: A support layer for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Unlike pure LST, LST-YSZ composites can form a laminated structure on porous YSZ.
Titulo: A support layer for solid oxide fuel cells

Sentencas: Unlike pure YSZ, a dense LST-YSZ composite with 60-wt% LST exhibited an electronic conductivity of 7.6 S/cm at 700 degrees C after reduction in H-2 at 1000 degrees C, making the composite layer attractive for current collection in anode-supported cells.
Titulo: A support layer for solid oxide fuel cells

Titulo: A support layer for solid oxide fuel cells
A support layer for solid oxide fuel cells
